An exposition vppon the Booke of the Canticles, otherwise called Schelomons Song. Published for the edification of the Church of God. By T.VV. T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.
[8], 285, [3] p.
Printed [by Robert Waldegrave] for Thomas Man, At London : Anno. 1585.
T.VV. = Thomas Wilcox. Printer's name from STC. The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
